name: Hitmen Havoc
description:
Hitmen Havoc is a 1-8 player online party shooter.

Battle against friends, strangers or AI using a wide array of destructive weapons.
Choose between 8 unique hitmen, each with distinct weapons and abilities that allow you to creatively lay waste to your foes. Resources are limited, though, so you’ll have to battle for precious ammo, grenades, and healing items so you don’t end up on the back foot. Take the party to multiple different stages with varied layouts and environmental mechanics that keep the fighting fresh.

Allows 1 to 8 players to compete
Compete to destroy to make or destroy friendships in online PvP, or face the shooting frenzy solo against AI gunslingers.

In Hitmen Havoc, it’s always raining bullets and explosions. Will you join the party?
